name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a passion for vintage gaming. With its retro console box body, retro console buttons, and foundry arms and legs, RetroBot is a true homage to the golden era of gaming. Although its screen may be broken, RetroBot makes up for it with its exceptional abilities and skills. It is a proud member of the WebtrES club, constantly seeking new adventures in the digital realm.
